title: Coronavirus Impact on IT Spending
itunes:title: Coronavirus Impact on IT Spending
description:
Bloomberg News U.S. Heath Care Team Leader Drew Armstrong joins to provide a coronavirus update. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Sarah Frier share their insight on how Mark Zuckerberg’s jealousy held back Instagram and drove off founders. Crawford Del Prete, President at IDC Research, discusses how the coronavirus is impacting IT spending. And we Drive to the Close with George Mateyo, Chief Investment Officer at Key Private Bank.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.




See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
